feedback: Consider incorporating specific examples of your technical skills and their applications in relevant projects, to further emphasize your practical readiness.
Be mindful of the time constraint during interviews and aim to concisely summarize your projects and experiences without omitting key details.
Practice answering common interview questions related to your career goals and domain expertise, ensuring you can articulate your long-term aspirations in a clear and compelling manner.

grading_debug.notes: The student demonstrates a strong academic background, impressive practical experience, and relevant technical skills. They effectively structure their introduction, but may benefit from slightly improving delivery and concision.
